CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, January 7, 1950, pg. 17, reads: "Biggest Crowd in History Sees Homer Brown Take Oath as Judge... - Photos by Smith and Harris"
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of Paul F. Jones, Judge Homer S. Brown, and Richard F. Jones, in corridor of Allegheny County Courthouse with "County Court No. 1, Judge Harkins" sign in background, for Brown's investiture ceremony
CatSubject_tab: Men--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Allegheny County Courthouse (Pittsburgh, Pa.)Corridors--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Doors--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Signs--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Brown, Homer S.Jones, Paul F.Jones, Richard F.Judges--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Attorneys--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.
